com.opendxl.databus.consumer

Class ConsumerRecord<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opendxl.databus.consumer.ConsumerRecord<P>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - Payload's type

    public class ConsumerRecord<P>
extends java.lang.Object
    It represents a consumer record created by a DatabusConsumer when a new incoming message comes up.
